array.string: Fixed calendar issue; trips are now added to the calendar with the correct date.
Minor fixes to station names and maps.
Updated for iOS 11 and iPhone X.
New QR code reader and added flashlight.
Fixed many interface quirks with different width screens, things just align better now.
Detours are grouped by route and text is more compact.
Bigger route color circles and squares for trains.
Shortened route names for streetcar arrivals to make them bigger on the screen.
Several bug fixes from bugs found from crash logs.
Fixed bug in which blank arrivals were displayed if commuter bookmark is triggered while already fetching data.
Minor user interface text changes.
.9.1 (January 2017)
Fixed bookmarks so first stop is not duplicated when editing.
.9.0 (December 2016)
Updated for iOS 10.
$railMap New Portland Streetcar Map.
Fixed Trip Planner for when locale is set to several non-English locales.
Watch app is more responsive. (Updated Watch app to be a "native" Watch OS application).
Lots of bug fixes and UI tweaks (e.g. Contacts in iOS 10).
Because of Apple tools, removed iOS6/iOS7 support.
Lots of internal code changes to make new features easier to add...
Added back link to TriMet Ticket app, as they have fixed their app and it is launchable again.
Added 'Take me somewhere now' user interface for new bookmarks.
Bug fixes, including crash when entering unknown stop ID.
Bug fixes to stop iOS 6 crashes (this is the last iOS6 version).
#BWatch:#0 Added dictation and keypad (hard press from home screen)
+https://trimet.org/#alerts Updated link to #b#BTriMet#b#0 alert page and changed all web pages to use internal browser.
Removed link to TriMet Ticket app, as it no longer launches (their app changed - will restore this when they fix it)
.8.0 (February 2016)
Fixed notifications so #Ralarms#0 will #iactually#i work, added single button to add alarms for planned trips.
Updates for #biOS 9#b including searchable bookmarks, stations and routes. The first 4 bookmarks appear as Quick Actions on the home screen for iPhone 6S.
$railMap Updated #b#BTriMet#b#0 MAX map - they changed it again to include the new streetcar route names and colors.
Using Handoff, arrival screens and trip results can be passed between devices.
#BWatch:#0 Improved navigation though lists of stops on the watch by adding a "Next stop" button where appropriate.
#BWatch:#0 Added automatic commuter bookmark to the watch.
Arrival detail screen is now auto-refreshed; added a map so now you watch watch the bus or train get closer as you wait.
Added support for iPad split view and overlay; updated for iPad Pro screen size.
Maps that show routes and stops now also show vehicle locations for that route.
$vehicles Maps now show buses & trains as arrows pointing in the direction of travel and using the route color.
Trip planner now correctly says to stay on the train if the route color changes (e.g. #OOrange#0 trains change to #YYellow#0).
All distances are now given in tenths of a mile or feet if shorter than 0.1 miles. Metric distances remain the same.
For arrivals, added ability to find the nearest stops going in the other direction.
Updated help screen with more infomation and #bf#b#io#i#Rr#Gm#Ya#0t#O#bt#b#Ai#On#0g.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.
